text: Cognitive Development: a specialty in psychology that studies how thinking skills develop over time : . « Piaget’s theory is perhaps the most well-known and most studied theory of cognitive development T o Schema: a mental idea, concept, or thought formed based on (A s & experiences with world; guides future understanding and - action ; o Assimilation: the process by which an existing schema is used to understand something new in the environment o Accommodation: the process by which a schema is changed, modified, or created anew in order to understand something new in the environment
